resources.string: NOT FOR NAVIGATION, ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY

MX Tides © 2015 Will Kamp
https://github.com/manimaul/MX-Tides

MX Tides is an Android port of XTide by David Flater
Please see: http://flaterco.com/xtide

MX Tides also uses the following open source libraries:

AndXtideLib - http://github.com/manimaul/andxtidelib

AndroidSVG - https://code.google.com/p/androidsvg

GeoHash - https://github.com/kungfoo/geohash-java

RXAndroid - https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxAndroid
